summary.span: 封装窗体的数据源。

span.span: Encapsulates the data source for a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组件有许多用途。The component serves many purposes. 首先，它通过提供货币管理、 更改通知和 Windows 窗体控件和数据源之间的其他服务需要简化了将控件绑定到数据窗体上。First, it simplifies binding controls on a form to data by providing currency management, change notification, and other services between Windows Forms controls and data sources. 这通过附加实现组件与数据源使用属性。This is accomplished by attaching the component to your data source using the property. 对于复杂绑定方案，可以根据需要设置属性设置为特定的列或数据源中的列表。For complex binding scenarios you can optionally set the property to a specific column or list in the data source. 你随后可以绑定到控件。You then bind controls to the . 与数据的所有进一步交互通过调用组件。All further interaction with the data is accomplished with calls to the component. 有关示例如何可以简化绑定过程，请参阅[How to: Windows 窗体控件绑定到 DBNull 数据库值](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-windows-forms-controls-to-dbnull-database-values.md)和[如何： 处理错误和异常因数据绑定该发生](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-handle-errors-and-exceptions-that-occur-with-databinding.md).For examples on how the can simplify the binding process, see [How to: Bind Windows Forms Controls to DBNull Database Values](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-windows-forms-controls-to-dbnull-database-values.md) and [How to: Handle Errors and Exceptions that Occur with Databinding](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-handle-errors-and-exceptions-that-occur-with-databinding.md). 导航和更新的数据源通过实现的方法如， ，和。Navigation and updating of the data source is accomplished through methods such as , , and . 通过排序和筛选等操作来处理和属性。Operations such as sorting and filtering are handled through the and properties. 有关详细信息使用排序和筛选与，请参阅[How to： 排序和筛选器使用 Windows 窗体 BindingSource 组件的 ADO.NET 数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sort-and-filter-ado-net-data-with-wf-bindingsource-component.md)。For more information on using sorting and filtering with the , see [How to: Sort and Filter ADO.NET Data with the Windows Forms BindingSource Component](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sort-and-filter-ado-net-data-with-wf-bindingsource-component.md). 此外，组件可以充当强类型化的数据源。In addition, the component can act as a strongly typed data source. 通常通过以下机制之一被固定的基础数据源的类型：Typically the type of the underlying data source is fixed through one of the following mechanisms: - 使用方法将添加一个项组件。Use the method to add an item to the component. - 设置列表、 单个对象或类型的属性。Set the property to a list, single object, or type. 这两种机制创建强类型列表。Both of these mechanisms create a strongly-typed list. 有关详细信息如何使用若要将绑定到一种类型，请参阅[如何： 将 Windows 窗体控件绑定到类型](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-type.md)。For more information on how to use the to bind to a type, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Type](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-type.md). 你还可以使用以将控件绑定到工厂对象。You can also use the to bind your controls to a factory object. 有关如何执行此操作的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将 Windows 窗体控件绑定到工厂对象](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-factory-object.md)。For more information on how to do this, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Factory Object](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-factory-object.md). > [!NOTE] > 因为句柄这两个简单和复杂的数据源，术语会产生问题。Because a handles both simple and complex data sources, terminology is problematic. 在此类文档，术语*列表*指托管的数据源中的数据集合和*项*表示单个元素。Within this class documentation, the term *list* refers to a data collection within the hosted data source, and *item* denotes a single element. 当讨论功能与关联复杂的数据源的等效条款*表*和*行*使用。When discussing functionality associated with complex data sources, the equivalent terms *table* and *row* are used. 提供用于访问基础数据成员。 provides members for accessing the underlying data. 可以通过检索当前项可以通过检索属性，并且整个列表属性。The current item can be retrieved through the property, and the entire list can be retrieved through the property. 支持对当前项通过编辑操作和， ，和和方法。Editing operations are supported on the current item through and the , , and and methods. 尽管货币管理会自动处理所有基础数据源类型，此类公开的数目的事件，如和，允许自定义。Although currency management is handled automatically for all underlying data source types, this class exposes a number of events, such as and , that allow for customization. 绑定到的数据源组件还可导航和管理与类，该类提供用于浏览列表中的项类似 VCR 用户界面 (UI)。Data sources that are bound to a component can also be navigated and managed with the class, which provides a VCR-like user interface (UI) for navigating items within a list. 尽管可以绑定到任何数据源，它旨在与集成组件通过其属性。Although can be bound to any data source, it was designed to integrate with a component through its property. 默认属性类是。The default property for the class is . 默认事件是。The default event is . > [!CAUTION] > 成员的许多类对表示的基础列表操作属性，并且只引用对基础列表其操作。Many of the members of the class operate on the underlying list represented by the property and simply refer their operation to the underlying list. 因此，当绑定到的自定义实现，这些成员的确切行为可能与类文档中所述的行为不同。Therefore, when the is bound to a custom implementation of , the exact behavior of these members may differ from the behavior described in the class documentation. 例如，方法调用。For example, the method calls . 文档描述了方法，并介绍的方法基础正确实现。The documentation describes the method with the understanding that the method for the underlying is correctly implemented. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示绑定到。The following code example demonstrates a bound to a . 绑定到包含字体列表。The is bound to a that contains a list of fonts. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceAndBindingListOfT#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceAndBindingListOfT/CS/Form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceAndBindingListOfT#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceAndBindingListOfT/VB/Form1.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件在一个新的对象添加到表示的基础列表之前发生属性。The event occurs before a new object is added to the underlying list represented by the property. 此事件激发后调用方法，但在创建新项并将其添加到基础列表之前。This event is fired after the method is called, but before the new item is created and added to the underlying list. 通过处理此事件，程序员可以提供自定义项创建和插入行为，无需强制派生自类。By handling this event, the programmer can provide custom item creation and insertion behavior without being forced to derive from the class. 这可以通过在事件处理程序中设置属性到新的项的参数。This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the property of the parameter to the new item. 在中创建的新对象事件必须与列表中包含的类型相同类型或将发生异常。The new object created in the event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur. 无法设置属性绑定到时或因为不能添加新到列表。You cannot set the property when bound to a or because you cannot add a new to the list. 有关提供自定义新建项功能的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information about supplying custom new item functionality, see the method. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用组件绑定到列表控件。The following code example uses a component to bind a list to a control. 向列表添加新项事件处理程序。New items are added to the list by the event handler. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 BindingSource 自定义项添加](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/VB/form1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将新项添加到表示的基础列表属性。The method adds a new item to the underlying list represented by the property. 此方法设置为以下一系列操作：This method sets up the following series of actions: 1. 自动调用方法以提交任何挂起的编辑操作。The method is automatically called to commit any pending edit operations. 2. 自动引发事件。The event is automatically raised. 可以以编程方式处理此事件来构造新的项。This event can be programmatically handled to construct the new item. 这可以通过在事件处理程序中设置属性到新的项的参数。This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the property of the parameter to the new item. 在中创建的新对象事件必须与列表中包含的类型相同类型或将发生异常。The new object created in the event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur. 如果不处理事件，并且基础列表是，则该请求传递给此列表的方法。If the event is not handled, and the underlying list is an , then the request is passed to the list's method. 如果基础列表不是 ，则通过该项的公共默认构造函数自动创建该项。If the underlying list is not an , the item is automatically created through its public default constructor. 在任一情况下，新项添加到列表的末尾。In either case, the new item is added to the end of the list. 3. 添加新项是立即到内部列表除非数据源实现接口。The new item is added immediately to the internal list unless the data source implements the interface. 在这种情况下，新的项也不会提交之前显式调用进行或直到初始化一个新的列表操作。In this case, the new item is not committed until an explicit call to is made or until a new list operation is initiated. 提交之前，新的项可以回滚通过调用，在这种情况下新项将被丢弃。Before it is committed, the new item can be rolled back by calling , in which case the new item is discarded. 此方法将引发事件。This method raises the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用组件绑定到列表控件。The following code example uses a component to bind a list to a control. 向列表添加新项事件处理程序。New items are added to the list by the event handler. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 BindingSource 自定义项添加](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为属性取决于基础数据源类型。The default value for the property depends on the underlying data source type. 如果基础列表实现接口，此属性将委托给基础列表。If the underlying list implements the interface, this property will delegate to the underlying list. 否则，此属性将返回`false`如果基础列表不包含任何以下特征：Otherwise, this property will return `false` if the underlying list has any of the following characteristics: - 它具有固定的大小，所确定的那样属性。It has a fixed size, as determined by the property. - 它是只读的由属性。It is read-only, as determined by the property. - 项的类型不具有默认构造函数。The item's type does not have a default constructor. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性的值后，getter 不再引用对基础列表的调用。Once the value of this property is set, the getter no longer refers the call to the underlying list. 相反，它只需返回的值之前已设置直到调用方法。Instead, it simply returns the value that was previously set until the method is called. 设置此属性会引发事件和设置为。Setting this property raises the event with set to . 如果你设置属性`true`和基础列表类型没有默认构造函数，则必须处理事件并创建相应的类型。If you set the property to `true` and the underlying list type does not have a default constructor, you must handle the event and create the appropriate type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性组件以允许用户添加新项目添加到组件的基础列表。The following code example demonstrates using the property of the component to permit the user to add new items to the component's underlying list. 此属性设置为`true`导致绑定控件来显示新记录所在的行。Setting this property to `true` causes the bound control to display its row for new records. A引发事件且设置为。A event is raised with set to . - A`metaDataChanged`值`false`指示仅一个或多个项的值已更改。A `metaDataChanged` value of `false` indicates that only the values of one or more items have changed. 无论的值如何`metaDataChanged`、引发事件且设置为。Regardless of the value of `metaDataChanged`, a event is raised with set to . 因此，调用其中参数`true`将引发两个事件。As a consequence, calling with a parameter of `true` will raise two events. 每当另一个成员中对数据绑定，例如设置进行主要更改，就会自动调用或属性。 is automatically called whenever another member makes major changes to the data-binding, such as setting the or properties. 但是，程序员还可以显式调用此方法。However, the programmer can also call this method explicitly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用组件绑定数组列表中，不提供更改通知。The following code example uses a component to bind an array list, which does not provide change notification. 从列表中，移除项和更改的通知绑定的控件，应调用方法。An item is removed from the list, and the bound controls are notified of the change by calling the method. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 使用 BindingSource Windows 窗体控件中反映数据源更新](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/reflect-data-source-updates-in-a-wf-control-with-the-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Reflect Data Source Updates in a Windows Forms Control with the BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/reflect-data-source-updates-in-a-wf-control-with-the-bindingsource.md). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResumeBinding() cil managed

summary.span: 继续数据绑定。

span.span: Resumes data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和允许在一个简单绑定方案中使用的临时挂起和恢复的数据绑定的这两种方法。 and are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple-binding scenario. 如果必须允许用户对数据字段进行编辑，验证发生之前，通常会挂起数据绑定。You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs. 例如，如果必须将一个字段更改时根据第二个，但验证第一个字段将导致将在错误中的第二个字段。For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error. > [!NOTE] > 使用防止更改推送到数据源之前被调用但实际上不能阻止任何事件发生。Using prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring. 如使用复杂数据绑定控件控制，如基于更改事件其值更新事件，因此调用不会阻止它们接收到数据源的更改。Controls that use complex data binding, such as the control, update their values based on change events such as the event, so calling will not prevent them from receiving changes to the data source. 因此，这和设计用于简单绑定控件，如控件。For this reason, this and are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the control. 或者你可以使用这些方法在一个复杂绑定方案，如果您禁止显示事件通过设置属性`false`。Alternatively you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress events by setting the property to `false`.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于排序的列名称以及用于查看数据源中的行的排序顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the column names used for sorting, and the sort order for viewing the rows in the data source.

value.span: 一个区分大小写的字符串，它包含列名，后跟“ASC”（升序）或“DESC”（降序）。

span.span: A case-sensitive string containing the column name followed by "ASC" (for ascending) or "DESC" (for descending).

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个区分大小写的字符串，指定使用以及排序方向对行进行排序的列名称。The property is a case-sensitive string that specifies the column names used to sort the rows, along with the sort direction. 默认情况下，列按升序排序。Columns are sorted ascending by default. 多个列可以由逗号分隔，如`"State, ZipCode DESC"`。Multiple columns can be separated by commas, such as `"State, ZipCode DESC"`. 若要支持排序，基础列表必须实现或接口。To support sorting, the underlying list must implement the or interfaces. 此功能可以通过查询属性。This capability can be queried through the property. 多列排序，则可用时属性是`true`。Multicolumn sorting is available when the property is `true`. 设置属性将更改具体取决于其类型的内部列表：Setting the property will change the internal list depending on its type: - 如果列表为的类型、和属性将设置在内部列表。If the list is of type , the and properties are set in the internal list. - 如果列表为的类型、属性设置。If the list is of type , the property is set. 不排序字符串时，才会更改内部列表的排序属性`null`。The internal list's sort properties are only changed when the sort string is not `null`. `get`此属性访问器不会检索内部列表的排序值; 相反，它将返回`set`访问器值。The `get` accessor for this property will not retrieve the sort value of the internal list; instead, it will return the `set` accessor value. 值属性将保留数据源发生更改时。The value of the property will persist when the data source changes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来执行基本排序。The following example shows how to use the property to perform basic sorting with a . 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`PopulateDataViewAndSort`从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `PopulateDataViewAndSort` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 应导入你的窗体和命名空间。Your form should import the and namespaces. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMethods/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMethods#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMethods/VB/Form1.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以执行高级排序。The following example shows how to use the property to perform advanced sorting with a . 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`PopulateDataViewAndAdvancedSort`从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `PopulateDataViewAndAdvancedSort` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 应导入你的窗体和命名空间。Your form should import the and namespaces. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SuspendBinding() cil managed

summary.span: 挂起数据绑定，以阻止使用所做的更改对绑定数据源进行更新。

span.span: Suspends data binding to prevent changes from updating the bound data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和允许在一个简单绑定方案中使用的临时挂起和恢复的数据绑定的这两种方法。 and are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple-binding scenario. 如果必须允许用户对数据字段进行编辑，验证发生之前，通常会挂起数据绑定。You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs. 例如，如果必须将一个字段更改时根据第二个，但验证第一个字段将导致将在错误中的第二个字段。For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error. > [!NOTE] > 使用，并防止更改推送到数据源之前被调用但实际上不能阻止任何事件发生。Using and prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring. 如使用复杂数据绑定控件控制，如基于更改事件其值更新事件，因此调用不会阻止它们接收到数据源的更改。Controls that use complex data binding, such as the control, update their values based on change events such as the event, so calling will not prevent them from receiving changes to the data source. 因此，这和设计用于简单绑定控件，如控件。For this reason, this and are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the control. 或者你可以使用这些方法在一个复杂绑定方案，如果您禁止显示事件通过设置属性`false`。Alternatively you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress events by setting the property to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法回滚之前添加到集合中由指定的索引处的项的挂起的添加`position`。The method rolls back a pending addition of an item previously added to the collection at the index specified by `position`. `position`参数是必需的因为几个新项可能同时挂起。The `position` parameter is necessary because several new items can be simultaneously pending.
